nodes.text: @WholelottaAri when payday comes the lavish palette is going straight into my cart 👀
All of these awesome small black-owned businesses that sell lip glosses keep following me on insta and it’s taking all of my will power not to buy a gloss from all of them at once

@robbiejem Hey, I have a black owned business selling handmade lip glosses, chapstick & lip scrubs. Create your own bundle with all 3 items for a very low, affordable price. There’s also 10% off all purchases 💕 Visit https://t.co/qmzs3Q0Nrs to place your order https://t.co/83PfWdTjtS
I def will over time tho bc I am addicted to lip gloss lmaooo
